ComicInfo.Penciller: Luis Garcia,Matt Kindt,Michael Royer,Peter Bagge,Ted Naifeh,Vanesa R. Del Rey
ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s a sickening sweet sixteen! Join Uncle Creepy for some sensational scares from a cavalcade of cursedly clever creators! Rachel Deering and Vanesa R. Del Rey wind up a lovesick mechanical monstrosity, and Ted Naifeh gives a lurid lesson in blackmail and bewitching bedlam! It’s a fright delight!
New story and art from Ted Naifeh (Courtney Crumrin and the Night Things)!
Horror’s rising star Rachel Deering (Anathema, In the Dark)!
*Story Titles* Do Not Click Like Clockwork The Creepy Family in "The Cats of Ulthar" I Hate You! I Hate You!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/creepy-16/4000-450049/
ComicInfo.Writer: Bill Warren,Dan Braun,Jack Butterworth,Matt Kindt,Peter Bagge,Rachel Autumn Deering,Ted Naifeh
